sentences.en: She packed one change of underwear.
sentences.cn: 她打行李时带了一套换洗的内衣。

sentences.en: For Christmas my brother and I got new underwear, one toy and one book.
sentences.cn: 作为圣诞礼物，我弟弟和我得到了新内衣、一件玩具和一本书。

sentences.en: All of my socks and underwear are plain and mostly black.
sentences.cn: 我所有的袜子和内衣都是纯色而且大部分是黑色的。
